channel.title: Comments on: Top 8 Free Chocolate Chip Cookies

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/top-eight-free-chocolate-chip-cookies/#comment-19">Mark</a>.
Thank you for the comment and so happy to hear you enjoyed the cookies!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mark.

Thank you for the comment and so happy to hear you enjoyed the cookies!

item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: We made these cookies using the coconut oil substitution for coconut manna. The cookies were simply good soft chocolate chip cookies. Without being told, no one would have thought that these cookies were top eight free.
item.content:encoded: We made these cookies using the coconut oil substitution for coconut manna. The cookies were simply good soft chocolate chip cookies. Without being told, no one would have thought that these cookies were top eight free.
